decisions.description: This element will check if this user is added as a manager in other user profiles.
decisions.name: dcsTeamFound
decisions.label: dcsTeamFound

Flow.description: This screenflow will display an overview of all the focus clients and totals per user and or full team.

dynamicChoiceSets.description: This record choice will show all users where the manager is equal to the logged in user.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: rcsMyTeam

dynamicChoiceSets.description: This record choice set is based on the tasks with type: Accountplanning and the checkbox Accountplanning activated.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: rcsSubmittedUsers

formulas.name: fmNextYear
formulas.expression: TEXT (YEAR(TODAY())+1)

formulas.name: fmQueryPrio1ApprovedAccountPlans
formulas.expression: IF ({!plUser} = {!chMyTeam}, "SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM Account_Plan__c WHERE ApprovalStatusPick__c = 'Approved' AND AccountPlanOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!$User.Id} + "' AND FocusClientOwnerPick__c = 'Prio 1'", "SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM Account_Plan__c WHERE ApprovalStatusPick__c = 'Approved' AND AccountPlanOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!plUser} + "' AND FocusClientOwnerPick__c = 'Prio 1'")

formulas.name: fmQueryPrio1Clients
formulas.expression: IF ({!plUser} = {!chMyTeam}, "SELECT Id, AccountNameForm__c, Name, StatusPick__c, FocusClientPick__c FROM BusinessUnitSpecificAttribute__c WHERE BusinessUnitOwnerRef__r.ManagerId = '" + {!$User.Id} + "' AND FocusClientPick__c = 'Prio 1'", "SELECT Id, AccountNameForm__c, Name, StatusPick__c, FocusClientPick__c FROM BusinessUnitSpecificAttribute__c WHERE BusinessUnitOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!plUser} + "' AND FocusClientPick__c = 'Prio 1'")

formulas.name: fmQueryPrio1ClientsCount
formulas.expression: IF ({!plUser} = {!chMyTeam}, "SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM BusinessUnitSpecificAttribute__c WHERE BusinessUnitOwnerRef__r.ManagerId = '" + {!$User.Id} + "' AND FocusClientPick__c = 'Prio 1'", "SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM BusinessUnitSpecificAttribute__c WHERE BusinessUnitOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!plUser} + "' AND FocusClientPick__c = 'Prio 1'")

formulas.name: fmQueryPrio1InProgressAccountPlans
formulas.expression: IF ({!plUser} = {!chMyTeam}, "SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM Account_Plan__c WHERE (ApprovalStatusPick__c = 'Draft' OR ApprovalStatusPick__c = 'Submitted' ) AND AccountPlanOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!$User.Id} + "' AND FocusClientOwnerPick__c = 'Prio 1'", "SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM Account_Plan__c WHERE (ApprovalStatusPick__c = 'Draft' OR ApprovalStatusPick__c = 'Submitted' ) AND AccountPlanOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!plUser} + "' AND FocusClientOwnerPick__c = 'Prio 1'")

formulas.name: fmQueryPrio2ApprovedAccountPlans
formulas.expression: IF ({!plUser} = {!chMyTeam}, "SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM Account_Plan__c WHERE ApprovalStatusPick__c = 'Approved' AND AccountPlanOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!$User.Id} + "' AND FocusClientOwnerPick__c = 'Prio 2'", "SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM Account_Plan__c WHERE ApprovalStatusPick__c = 'Approved' AND AccountPlanOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!plUser} + "' AND FocusClientOwnerPick__c = 'Prio 2'")

formulas.name: fmQueryPrio2Clients
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, AccountNameForm__c, Name, StatusPick__c, FocusClientPick__c FROM BusinessUnitSpecificAttribute__c WHERE BusinessUnitOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!plUser} + "' AND FocusClientPick__c = 'Prio 2'"

formulas.name: fmQueryPrio2ClientsCount
formulas.expression: IF ({!plUser} = {!chMyTeam}, "SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM BusinessUnitSpecificAttribute__c WHERE BusinessUnitOwnerRef__r.ManagerId = '" + {!$User.Id} + "' AND FocusClientPick__c = 'Prio 2'", "SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM BusinessUnitSpecificAttribute__c WHERE BusinessUnitOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!plUser} + "' AND FocusClientPick__c = 'Prio 2'")

formulas.name: fmQueryPrio2InProgressAccountPlans
formulas.expression: IF ({!plUser} = {!chMyTeam}, "SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM Account_Plan__c WHERE (ApprovalStatusPick__c = 'Draft' OR ApprovalStatusPick__c = 'Submitted' ) AND AccountPlanOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!$User.Id} + "' AND FocusClientOwnerPick__c = 'Prio 2'", "SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM Account_Plan__c WHERE (ApprovalStatusPick__c = 'Draft' OR ApprovalStatusPick__c = 'Submitted' ) AND AccountPlanOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!plUser} + "' AND FocusClientOwnerPick__c = 'Prio 2'")

formulas.name: fmQueryPrio3ApprovedAccountPlans
formulas.expression: IF ({!plUser} = {!chMyTeam}, "SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM Account_Plan__c WHERE ApprovalStatusPick__c = 'Approved' AND AccountPlanOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!$User.Id} + "' AND FocusClientOwnerPick__c = 'Prio 3'", "SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM Account_Plan__c WHERE ApprovalStatusPick__c = 'Approved' AND AccountPlanOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!plUser} + "' AND FocusClientOwnerPick__c = 'Prio 3'")

formulas.name: fmQueryPrio3Clients
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, AccountNameForm__c, Name, StatusPick__c, FocusClientPick__c FROM BusinessUnitSpecificAttribute__c WHERE BusinessUnitOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!plUser} + "' AND FocusClientPick__c = 'Prio 3'"

formulas.name: fmQueryPrio3ClientsCount
formulas.expression: IF ({!plUser} = {!chMyTeam}, "SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM BusinessUnitSpecificAttribute__c WHERE BusinessUnitOwnerRef__r.ManagerId = '" + {!$User.Id} + "' AND FocusClientPick__c = 'Prio 3'", "SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM BusinessUnitSpecificAttribute__c WHERE BusinessUnitOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!plUser} + "' AND FocusClientPick__c = 'Prio 3'")

formulas.name: fmQueryPrio3InProgressAccountPlans
formulas.expression: IF ({!plUser} = {!chMyTeam}, "SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM Account_Plan__c WHERE (ApprovalStatusPick__c = 'Draft' OR ApprovalStatusPick__c = 'Submitted' ) AND AccountPlanOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!$User.Id} + "' AND FocusClientOwnerPick__c = 'Prio 3'", "SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM Account_Plan__c WHERE (ApprovalStatusPick__c = 'Draft' OR ApprovalStatusPick__c = 'Submitted' ) AND AccountPlanOwnerRef__r.Name = '" + {!plUser} + "' AND FocusClientOwnerPick__c = 'Prio 3'")

formulas.name: fmTableTitleFocusClientsPrio1
formulas.expression: IF ({!fmUserLanguageCode} = 'nl_NL', {!plUser} + " - " + 'Prio 1' + " focus klanten voor " + {!fmThisYearText}, {!plUser} + " - " + 'Prio 1'+ " focus clients for " + {!fmThisYearText})

formulas.name: fmTableTitleFocusClientsPrio2
formulas.expression: IF ({!fmUserLanguageCode} = 'nl_NL', {!plUser} + " - " + 'Prio 2' + " focus klanten voor " + {!fmNextYear}, {!plUser} + " - " + 'Prio 2' + " focus clients for " + {!fmNextYear})

formulas.name: fmTableTitleFocusClientsPrio3
formulas.expression: IF ({!fmUserLanguageCode} = 'nl_NL', {!plUser} + " - " + 'Prio 3' + " focus klanten voor " + {!fmNextYear}, {!plUser} + " - " + 'Prio 3' + " focus clients for " + {!fmNextYear})

formulas.name: fmTaskMessage
formulas.expression: "Beste " + {!$User.ManagerFullName__c} + "," + br() + br() + "Mijn lijst met focus klanten voor " + {!fmNextYear} + "staat klaar voor accordering. Kun je deze s.v.p beoordelen?"

formulas.name: fmTaskSubject
formulas.expression: "Goedkeuring focus klanten: " + {!fmNextYear} + " - " + {!$User.FullNameForm__c}

formulas.name: fmThisYearText
formulas.expression: TEXT (YEAR(TODAY()))

formulas.name: fmTwoWeeks
formulas.expression: TODAY()+14

formulas.description: Extracts this user language code from the current user.
formulas.name: fmUserLanguageCode
formulas.expression: TEXT({!$User.LanguageLocaleKey})

Flow.interviewLabel: Focus Client - SCFL02 - Overview Focus Clients Director Homepage {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Focus Client - SCFL02 - Overview Focus Clients Director Homepage

fields.name: dtInProgressPrio2
fields.fieldText: {!dfAccountPlanIApprovedPrio2.aggQueryResult}

fields.name: dtApprovedPrio3
fields.fieldText: {!dfAccountPlanInProgressPrio3.aggQueryResult}

fields.name: dtWarning
fields.fieldText: There are no employees set with you as a manager. Please contact the System Administrator or ask your colleague to set you as a manager in his / her profile.

textTemplates.text:

textTemplates.text:
Account Plans
{!conPrio2AccountPlanProgress} DATAFETCHER {!conPrio2AccountPlanApproved} DATAFETCHER

textTemplates.name: ttPrio3AccountPlan
textTemplates.text:
Account Plans
{!conPrio3AccountPlanProgress} DATAFETCHER {!conPrio3AccountPlanApproved} DATAFETCHER
